script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Hello, I am calling to confirm the plans for the conference next week.

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Okay, let me check that. It looks like you'll be giving the keynote address on Monday, correct?

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Yes, that's right. And after that, I believe I have some meetings scheduled with a few of our colleagues. I'm not familiar with the building layout, so I'd like to pick up a building map from reception on Friday morning.

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Certainly, I'll make sure that's arranged for you. Is there anything else I can help you with at the moment?

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Hey, I'm calling to talk about some articles for our company newsletter. I'm working on updating the employee handbook, but I could use some additional content.

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Sure, I can help with that. This year, we've focused on domestic sales, but I'd like to organize a trade show next year and really focus on some foreign markets.

script.speaker: Man
script.text: That sounds interesting. We could write about that. Why don't you send me some details, and I'll draft something. I'll need to order some more business cards, too.

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Welcome to Barry's Boutique. What can I help you find today?

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Hi, I'm looking for a suit. I have a job interview soon, and I need something that looks professional.

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Certainly. How about this one on display? It's one of our best-sellers.

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Oh, I'm not too fond of the fabric. Do you have anything else?

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Of course. We have many different styles. And don't forget, the price includes alterations.

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: Hello, this is Alicia at Miller and Sons. I'm calling about that building you're constructing downtown. How is the project coming along?

script.speaker: Man
script.text: Hi, Alicia. Yes, it's moving along, but I am concerned about the length of the project. It's taking a bit longer than we anticipated.

script.speaker: Woman
script.text: I understand. Well, as you know, we specialize in project management and can help keep things on track. Would you be willing to let us measure the space and provide a cost estimate?

script.speaker: Man
script.text: That sounds great. When can you come down?
